items.title: LUDARP BIM Toolkit
items.description: A collection of pyRevit scripts and Dynamo graphs to speed up modelling, sheet production, and QA in Revit.
items.details: Includes small utilities for view/sheet naming, parameter checks, and repetitive modelling tasks. The focus is on practical tools that actually save time on real projects rather than big frameworks.

items.title: Site Logs → Dashboard
items.description: Idea for turning daily site logs, photos, and checklists into a live dashboard using simple web tools and spreadsheets.
items.details: Keep data entry lightweight (forms, sheets, WhatsApp) and convert it into visuals: progress curves, issue lists, and pending RFIs.

items.title: AEC Portfolio Engine
items.description: This portfolio itself: a modular template for engineers combining experience, BIM projects, and code in one place.
items.details: Built with React, Vite and Tailwind. Focuses on clean sections for experience, projects, BIM work and web tools — reusable as a starter for other engineers.

items.title: Learning Hub for Juniors
items.description: Plan for a small platform / playlist that explains BIM basics, drawings, and site coordination using simple examples.
items.details: Mix YouTube short videos, Notion guides and small reproducible examples that connect site photos with drawings and BIM views.
